page.title: 01Introducing the area
page.content: This is a{low lying rural area within the{flood plain}of the river Yeo. Annual flooding has maintained {rich meadowlands}for dairy cattle but has created a serious problem for those people of Ilchester living nearest the river who have many times experienced flooded homes. A recent {flood prevention scheme,}ringing the village with drainage pipes and embankments has hopefully overcome this problem; while a{by-pass}has returned the village to normal after years of increasingly congested roads. A feeling of{community}is prevalent with village fairs and fetes in the summer and a well supported school pantomime at Christmas. A Historical Society digs into the past. The following pages have been compiled by the pupils of Ilchester primary school.
